file_insights: web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.jsx was modified to integrate focus trapping
Added .auto-claude-status file to track project status
Created multiple metadata and progress tracking files in .auto-claude/specs/026-add-focus-trapping-and-role-attributes-to-alertdia/
patterns_discovered: Custom modal components lacking proper accessibility attributes
Inconsistent focus management across different modal implementations
Need for a centralized, reusable focus trapping mechanism
gotchas_discovered: Screen readers require specific role and aria attributes for modals
Focus trapping requires careful management of focusable elements
Need to handle both Tab and Shift+Tab key navigation in modals

key_achievements: Exported hook from central hooks index
Added initial ARIA attributes to AlertDialogContent

recommendations: Complete focus trapping implementation for all modal components
Add comprehensive accessibility tests for focus management
Standardize modal component accessibility across the entire application
